heading: 10 Minute Mail - Protects your privacy with temp mail.
refresh_to_see_mails_description: Refreshing stopped because there is no mail for a long time. To check mail click to refresh button.
custom_email_description: Enter your custom email address eg: yourname@example.com
domains_not_loaded: Domains not loaded yet. Please try again 10 seconds later.
no_domains: System is not allowed to create custom emails. Please contact your system administrator. info@bubiapps.com
dont_enter_domain: Don't enter domain name and @ sign. Example input: yourname
scan_code: To Scan Code Please enter 10minutesemail.net and scan the QR code.
